sense.name: (Cause to) preoccupy someone.
sense.commentary: Includes: OBSESS OVER, OBSESS ABOUT Syntax Includes: NP1[topic] OBSESS NP2[patient[animate]] NP1[agent[animate]] OBSESS (over) NP2[topic]
sense.examples: Fear of illness obsesses her. She is obsessing over her weight. John obsesses over the smallest details. Don't obsess about everything so much!
